attributes.action: Look into the fuel duty and taxes and bring prices down.
attributes.additional_details: The chancellor need to reduce the taxes on petrol and diesel, he could reduce by approximately 40p and still be making the same as 6 months ago. This would also help in the overall cost of living crisis we face as haulage firms can keep prices lower and thus everything stays down more. Also I believe that leisure and tourism will be hit as people won’t be willing to travel due to the costs involved so it will only get worse.
attributes.background: The need for petrol and diesel needs to come down. The chancellor is now making more than ever off fuel the taxes need to be reduced.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618421

You can find this and other petitions relating to fuel duty at

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&q=fuel+duty
